title: What is the easiest crop to grow? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tree crops are my favorite. Amaranth is supposedly a durrable plant with a fairly high Yield I would advice you to look up the “one straw revolution” for a high yield relive to the amount of work needed, if you are worried about weeds graze cows for grass, goats for woody plants/ BlackBerry leaves and pigs for black berry roots Please look up permaculture, early retirement extreme, and the wim hof method

It depends on the climate, soil, etc. If I had to pick one, beans/legumes are generally easiest. They germinate and sprout easily and overall have the least challenging pest complex and nutrient demands. This is in part why legumes are ubiquitous to so many cultures and diets.
